entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 6:11 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:11 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. High 10.
